Whenever you cast a spell that targets a single creature you control, bless that creature. [i](Create a token copy of this creature’s blessing attached to that permanent.)[/i]

Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may sacrifice it. If you do, untap all creatures you control and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
